GuardaEstados does not collect, store, or transmit any personal information from users. The application works completely locally on your device. We only access WhatsApp status files that you explicitly authorize through system permissions.

WhatsApp status information is used solely to display, save, and share files that you select. We do not process, analyze, or transmit these files to external servers. All processing is done locally on your device.

â€¢ Reading WhatsApp status files

These permissions are necessary for the basic functioning of the app and are not used for any other purpose.

The app may display Google AdMob ads. These ads may collect basic usage information to personalize the advertising experience. You can control ad consent from the app settings. Ads do not have access to your personal files or WhatsApp information.

Since we do not collect personal information, we have no data to delete or modify. However, you have complete control over:
â€¢ App permissions
